hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Contraction Breakout (VCB) with Regime Filter
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a period of low volatility (Bollinger Band Width 20-day < 0.05) in a NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above the 20-day upper Bollinger Band with above-average volume will lead to a directional trend lasting 4-8 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility compression in neutral regimes represents coiling energy. A high-volume breakout from this compression often initiates a short-term trend as trapped positions are forced to cover.
entry_conditions: BTC Bollinger Band Width (20,2) < 0.05 for 3+ days
Price closes above upper Bollinger Band

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price closes back inside Bollinger Bands OR 9% gain
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price closes below middle BB (20 SMA)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If more than 60% of such breakouts fail to sustain momentum (defined as not achieving at least a 2R profit before time exit) in backtest across 2021-2024 data.
